entry.title: Corporate Jargon
entry.summary:
Author: ggomoz (ggomo_springtime)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,252Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 329

Summary: It was the most peculiar thing to see Daniel Fenton and Marinette Dupain-Cheng vehemently turn down a project. There was disgust. Barely concealed loathing. What was so strange about their bosses’ offer? They were about to be given a chance to redesign the suits of Justice League members and renovate part of the Watchtower.On a completely unrelated note, an incident with the Order and the use of ectoplasm forces the Celestial Guardian and the King of the Infinite Realms to finally meet.
